p: Illumina sequencing yielded 10,299,664 and 16,336,098 reads for Bangladesh 2017 and Thail 2019, respectively, and raw sequence reads were processed using Geneious R10 version 10.2.6 software ( 7). Complete genome sequence assembly was achieved by mapping to a reference CHIKV genome sequence (strain CHIK31, GenBank accession number EU564335) that included 5′ and 3′ untranslated terminal sequences, using default parameters and the low-sensitivity setting. For Bangladesh 2017 (11,812 nt with 50.1% G+C content), a total of 4,908,657 reads with an average coverage depth of 45,504× were mapped to strain CHIK31. Similarly, a total of 8,240,564 reads with an average coverage depth of 78,217× were mapped to strain CHIK31 for Thail 2019 (11,812 nt with 50.1% G+C content).
